com.scs.stevetech1.entities

Class AbstractBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scs.stevetech1.entities.Entity
      • com.scs.stevetech1.entities.PhysicalEntity
        • com.scs.stevetech1.entities.AbstractBullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, ISimpleEntity<PhysicalEntity>, IAddedImmediately, ICausesHarmOnContact, IDontCollideWithComrades, IEntity, IPhysicalEntity, IProcessByClient, IProcessByServer

    public abstract class AbstractBullet
extends PhysicalEntity
implements IProcessByClient, ICausesHarmOnContact, IDontCollideWithComrades, IAddedImmediately
    AbstractBullet is a special kind of entity. - Time gets rewound when a bullet gets created by a player - They can use Rays for collision - The client that fired it doesn't get told about the server-side bullet
    Author:
    stephencs

        startPos -

        _side -
        _client -
        _useRay - Have CCD by using Rays
        _speed - Only used if the bullet uses Rays for collision, otherwise speed is handled by the physics engine.
